title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that a user can register successfully with valid credentials and complete email verification process.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill out the registration form with valid email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that a verification email is sent to the registered email.
Open verification link from the email.
Verify that the email verification completes and user status is updated to verified.

title: User Login Success with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure a registered verified user can log in successfully using valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid registered email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is successful and user is redirected to the appropriate user dashboard/homepage.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify the system denies login and shows appropriate error message when credentials are incorrect.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid email or password.
Click the login button.
Check that login is rejected with a clear error message.

title: Password Reset via Email
description: Validate the password reset flow including request, email delivery, and password update.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Submit a registered email to request password reset.
Confirm reset email is sent.
Open password reset link from the email.
Enter and confirm new valid password.
Submit the new password.
Verify the password is successfully updated; user can login with new password.

title: Create and Publish a New Blog Post with SEO Metadata and Featured Image
description: Test creation, editing, saving as draft, and publishing of a new blog post with SEO fields and featured image upload.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Blogger.
Navigate to the new post creation page.
Enter post title, content using rich text and markdown editors.
Set SEO metadata including meta title, description, and keywords.
Upload and set a featured image using Cloudinary integration.
Save the post as draft.
Verify post is saved as draft and can be edited later.
Publish the post immediately.
Confirm post is published and visible publicly with SEO data in metadata.

title: Schedule Blog Post Publication
description: Verify the ability to schedule a blog post for future publication.

steps.description: Login as Blogger or Admin.
Create a new post and enter all required content and SEO metadata.
Set a future date and time for publication using scheduling feature.
Save and confirm the post is scheduled.
Verify that the post is not publicly visible before scheduled time.
After the scheduled date/time, confirm the post is published automatically.

title: Edit and Update Existing Blog Post
description: Validate editing an existing published post and ensure updates are reflected immediately.

steps.description: Login as Blogger or Admin.
Open an existing post from the admin posts list.
Modify content, update SEO metadata and optionally change the featured image.
Save and publish the changes.
Verify the updated post content, metadata, and images are displayed correctly in the public view.

title: Delete Blog Post
description: Check that a blog post can be deleted permanently with confirmation dialog.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Blogger.
Navigate to the posts management page.
Select a post and click the delete action.
Confirm deletion in the confirmation dialog.
Verify the post no longer appears in the posts list and is not accessible publicly.

title: Role-Based Access Control for Admin, Blogger, and User
description: Verify that users with different roles can only access their permitted features and routes.

steps.description: Login as Admin and attempt to access all admin features including user management, audit logs, and settings.
Access should be granted for all admin features.
Logout and login as Blogger.
Try to access admin-only areas like user management and system settings.
Access should be denied with proper authorization error.
Verify Blogger can create, edit, and publish posts, but cannot manage users or settings.
Login as User role and verify access to only profile management and viewing posts, not editing or admin areas.
Ensure unauthorized access pages are blocked properly.

title: Add Nested Comments Including Guest Comments
description: Verify that users and guests can add nested comments and that guests provide basic local info.

steps.description: Navigate to a published blog post.
As a logged-in user, add a top-level comment.
Verify comment appears under the post.
Reply to a comment to create nested comments.
Verify nested comment is displayed properly indented.
As a guest user, enter name and email locally and add a comment.
Guest comment should appear and guest info should be stored locally.

title: Comment Moderation and Status Filtering by Admin
description: Test inline moderation actions like approve, reject, and delete with status filtering options.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to the comments management page.
Filter comments by status (pending, approved, rejected).
Verify comments are filtered accurately.
Perform moderation actions: approve, reject, or delete on selected comments.
Check the comment statuses update accordingly and are reflected in the public view.

title: Admin Dashboard Analytics Display
description: Verify that the admin dashboard shows accurate analytics data including user activity and content statistics.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Open the admin dashboard.
Ensure statistics for active users, published posts, comments counts, and recent activities are displayed.
Validate charts and data refresh correctly on dashboard load and interaction.

title: Full-Text Search with Debounced Input and Filtering
description: Test blog post search functionality covering debounced input, result highlighting, and filtering by category and tags.

steps.description: Navigate to the search page.
Type search keywords slowly and observe debounce functionality.
Verify that search results update only after the debounce delay.
Apply category and tag filters to the search.
Check search results are accurately filtered.
Confirm that keywords in results are highlighted.

title: Newsletter Subscription with Double Opt-In
description: Verify the newsletter subscription process including submission, double opt-in email verification, and admin management.

steps.description: Access the public newsletter subscription form.
Enter a valid email and submit.
Verify subscription request triggers a confirmation email for double opt-in.
Open and confirm subscription via link in email.
Verify subscriber status is active after confirmation.
Login as Admin and navigate to subscriber management.
Check that the new subscriber appears in the list with correct status.

title: Image and File Upload with Cloudinary Integration
description: Test file upload functionality during post creation with Cloudinary optimizing images and CDN delivery.

steps.description: Login as Blogger or Admin.
Navigate to new post creation or editing page.
Upload an image or file using inline upload interface.
Verify upload completes successfully and image is optimized by Cloudinary.
Ensure the uploaded image is delivered via CDN URL.
Insert the uploaded image inline within post content.
Verify the image appears correctly in the post preview.

title: SEO Features Including JSON-LD, Sitemap, and robots.txt
description: Validate SEO optimizations such as presence of structured data, accessible sitemap.xml, and correct robots.txt file.

steps.description: Navigate to a published blog post.
Confirm JSON-LD structured data is present in the page source and matches post metadata.
Access /sitemap.xml URL.
Verify sitemap contains URLs of all published posts with correct timestamps.
Access /robots.txt URL.
Confirm that robots.txt is accessible and correctly configured to allow/disallow paths.

title: User Management by Admin with Role Assignment
description: Ensure admins can view user list, change roles, disable or delete users, and that changes are enforced immediately.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to user management page.
Verify the user list displays all registered users with current roles.
Change a user's role to Blogger or User.
Confirm the role update is saved and reflected in the interface.
Disable and delete a user.
Verify the user loses access immediately and does not appear in active lists.

title: Audit Logs Display and Filtering in Admin
description: Test the admin audit log page for accurate tracking of user actions with filtering and search capabilities.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to the audit logs page.
Verify that recent user activities are listed with correct timestamps and descriptions.
Use filters or search to find specific user actions.
Confirm filtering works correctly and logs are updated in real-time when new actions occur.

title: Site-Wide Settings Configuration and Persistence
description: Verify admins can update site-wide settings and changes persist across sessions and application restarts.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Open the site settings management page.
Change settings such as blog title, default SEO parameters, or newsletter configurations.
Save the changes.
Verify that the changes are immediately reflected in relevant parts of the blog.
Restart the application and confirm settings persist.

title: Data Export for Posts and Content
description: Validate that admins can export blog posts and other content data correctly in supported formats.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to data export page.
Select export options for posts, comments, or other content.
Initiate export.
Verify completed export file is generated, downloadable, and contains expected data.
